name: CustomerClub
author: Ofek Nakar

sections.description:
Customer Club provide a system based on points to increase your users engagement,
you can provide specific number of points for each product and when order is paid the customer
will get the total amount of points from the order items and could use his points next time.

Benefits

  • Easy to install
  • Easy to edit/manage
  • Engage with users/clients
  • Increase your sells
  • Generate more Leads

A brief Example

Installation:

  1. Activate
  2. Navigate to CustomerClub Menu
  3. Add points for each products

Hello,Hola,Shalom from OFEK :), if there any need or support issue,you can reach me via
sections.faq:
What CustomerClub do ?

Customer Club provide a system based on points for your customers

How can i change/remove user points ?

you can edit the user in the admin dashboard menu and choose specific number of points

How can i use CustomerClub ?

you can start by giving each products points, and when users will buy products they will earn points
and can use them to get discount

The plugin support RTL ?

Yes the plugin support rtl

The plugin has Pro version ?

yes, you can find more details soon
sections.changelog:

  • A change since the previous version.
  • Another change.

0.5

  • List versions from most recent at top to oldest at bottom.
